name: experiment
label: Experiment
help: Historical refers to the experiments for the past. RCP/SSP refers to the various emission scenarios for the future projections. More details on thee scenarios are available in the CMIP5, CMIP6 and CORDEX documentation pages.

name: period
label: Period
help: This is the maximum temporal extent of each multi-model ensemble. Note that some models do not cover the entire temporal range. Also note that some CORDEX variables, none of the models cover 2099 and 2100, resulting in a period ending in 2098.

name: variable
label: Variable
help: Please consult either with the overview variable definitions or the "Consolidation of the IPCC Interactive Atlas Dataset in the CDS" document from the Documentation tab of this entry

labels.monthly_mean_of_daily_accumulated_precip: Monthly mean of daily accumulated precipitation
labels.monthly_mean_of_daily_accumulated_snowfa: Monthly mean of daily accumulated snowfall precipitation
labels.monthly_mean_of_acidity_of_seawater: Monthly mean of acidity (pH) of seawater
labels.monthly_mean_of_daily_mean_wind_speed: Monthly mean of daily mean wind speed
labels.monthly_mean_of_sea_ice_area_percentage: Monthly mean of sea-ice area percentage
labels.standardized_precipitation_index_for_6_m: Standardized precipitation index for 6 months cumulation period
labels.monthly_mean_of_sea_surface_temperature: Monthly mean of sea surface temperature
labels.monthly_mean_of_daily_mean_temperature: Monthly mean of daily mean temperature
labels.monthly_mean_of_daily_minimum_temperatur: Monthly mean of daily minimum temperature
labels.monthly_minimum_of_daily_minimum_tempera: Monthly minimum of daily minimum temperature
labels.monthly_mean_of_daily_maximum_temperatur: Monthly mean of daily maximum temperature
labels.monthly_count_of_days_with_maximum_tempe: Monthly count of days with maximum temperature above 35 °C
labels.bias_adjusted_monthly_count_of_days_with: Bias adjusted monthly count of days with maximum temperature above 35 °C
labels.monthly_count_of_days_with_maximum_tempe: Monthly count of days with maximum temperature above 40 °C
labels.bias_adjusted_monthly_count_of_days_with: Bias adjusted monthly count of days with maximum temperature above 40 °C
labels.monthly_maximum_of_daily_maximum_tempera: Monthly maximum of daily maximum temperature
